programme.title: Madagaskar 2
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad komedi från 2008. Djuren från New Yorks Zoo som hamnat på en strand i Madagaskar längtar tillbaka till storstaden. I ett flyplan reparerat av pingviner lämnar de ön, men det blir en kort resa. De kraschar i Afrikas djungel, och nu får de för första gången stifta bekantskap med sina släktingar i det vilda.

programme.title: Spy kids 4
programme.desc: Amerikansk familjefilm från 2011. Marissa har bestämt sig för att gå i tidig pension från spionyrket och fokusera på mammalivet. Att vara styvmor åt två tvillingar och dessutom vara gift med en spionjägare visar sig dock vara allt annat än enkelt. När en superskurk försöker ta över världen tar hon chansen att stoppa honom, samtidigt som hon sträcker ut en hand till sina styvbarn.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad komedi från 2004. Shrek och Fiona blir bjudna till Fionas föräldrar, kungen och drottningen av Landet-i-fjärran. Framme i Landet-i-fjärran kantas gatorna av nyfikna undersåtar som alla hoppas på att få en glimt av Fionas prins. Chocken blir dock stor när den efterlängtade prinsen visar sig vara ett träsktroll och äktenskapet mellan Fiona och Shrek stämmer definitivt inte med kungens idé om ett lyckligt slut och han bestämmer sig för att göra sig av med sin svärson för gott.

programme.title: Trolls 2: Världsturnén
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad familjefilm från 2020. Poppy och Kvist upptäcker att deras rike bara är en av sex musikaliska världar: funk, country, techno, klassiskt, pop och rock. Sex världar som tidigare varit förenade i perfekt harmoni.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A mystery man saves the life of a lieutenant and then disappears from the scene. Later on, the NCIS team unravels a new case when forensic evidence suggests he is a soldier who was captured in Afghanistan years ago and never found.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After tracking stolen navy TNT to a cocaine warehouse, Special Agent Pride and the team uncover a domestic ring that is producing their own cocaine and is headed by Sonja's childhood friend.Guests: Samaire Armstrong..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team protects a local DJ from a threatening perpetrator and investigates the murder of a navy captain who was attacked while on-air with the radio show. Also, Pride's daughter, Laurel, returns home to discuss her future plans.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team reviews unorthodox training exercises after a Navy Seal candidate is found murdered weeks before his graduation. Also, a concerned Wade turns to Pride after her adopted son, Danny, announces his plan to enter the Navy.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a sailor during a rowdy motorcycle rally in the city. Also, Lasalle turns to Gregorio for advice on his personal life.Guests: Blackberry Smoke..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a petty officer and member of the prestigious United States Navy Band is murdered in her home, Pride takes temporary custody of the victim's nephew, who is the sole witness to the crime.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a marine corporal who is an amateur racecar driver has a fatal crash on the track, the NCIS team investigates when they suspect foul play.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride must protect a beloved family friend who is engaged to the number one suspect in the ongoing NCIS and FBI cartel case.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.title: Elektra
programme.desc: An assassin ends up protecting the father and daughter she was commissioned to kill.

programme.title: Ocean's 8
programme.desc: After getting released from prison, Debbie Ocean puts together a crack team of skilled experts to pull of the heist of the century: infiltrating New York City's prestigious annual Met Gala and stealing the jewelry from its wealthy attendees.

programme.desc: After being thrown out by the Joker, Harley Quinn finds herself teaming up with the superheroes The Huntress and Black Canary and police detective Renee Montoya to destroy a criminal empire and rescue a young pickpocket with a bounty on her head.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: After a First World War pilot crashes near a mythical island, he meets a race of warrior women who live there. Their princess leaves with him to help stop the war raging in the outside world, setting out on the path to becoming the legendary Wonder Woman.

programme.desc: In a world overcome by lawlessness and corruption, an unwilling drug mule develops superhuman abilities when the drug leaks into her system.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The NCIS team discovers a surveillance van filled with photos documenting Special Agent Pride's every move after his daughter is attacked on campus and placed in protective custody.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After Pride travels to a deep-sea oil rig for a murder investigation, the team uncovers a gas leak that's on the verge of causing a catastrophic explosion. Also, Sebastian starts his NCIS special agent training at FLETEC.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After thousands of classified government files are stolen, the team searches for an underground group of hackers co-founded by Pride's old contact, Elvis Bertrand. Also, Sebastian joins the team as a newly minted NCIS Special Agent.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A gruesome copycat murder on a street car reopens a former case for Wade, evoking painful memories from her past.

programme.desc: A highly credentialed and skilled Special Ops Marine sends Pride and the team on a city-wide manhunt after he assaults six men in a bar.

programme.desc: Cheyenne and Van confirm Reba's worst nightmare: they feel Reba is becoming their own version of Barbra Jean by her unannounced visits to their new house.
